job:
Here is a 200-word condensed version of the job description:

As a Software Developer at Schrödinger, you'll play a key role in enabling scientific calculations at scale, contributing to the development of innovative computational methods that improve human health and quality of life. 

Requirements include:

* Strong Go development skills and familiarity with Python
* Solid understanding of distributed systems and concurrency
* Proficiency in testing and debugging
* Experience with Linux and Mac operating systems
* Passion for continuous learning and
